content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Forensics supports YARA, osquery, and Collect Evidence tasks on Linux endpoints January 11, 2023—The Forensics app now allows you to run YARA, osquery, and Collect Evidence tasks on Linux endpoints, enabling you to better monitor and analyze both Windows and Linux endpoints in your environment. For more information on these tasks, see Response actions. Agentic SIEM & XDR → Forensics © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Forensics supports YARA, osquery, and Collect Evidence tasks on Linux endpoints
